datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to timeless novels, renowned authors, and literary masterpieces.

columns.name: sentence_complexity
columns.description: Numerical indication of the syntactic complexity of sentences in the book

columns.name: allegory_usage
columns.description: Indicator if allegorical elements are used in the narrative.

columns.name: target_audience_age
columns.description: Defines the main age group the book is targeted at

columns.name: modern_slang_ratio
columns.description: Percentage of words categorized as modern slang per total word count in the book

columns.name: has_illustrations
columns.description: Indicates whether the book contains illustrations

columns.name: publication_year
columns.description: Year when the literary classic was published

columns.name: author_award_count
columns.description: Total number of literary awards received by the author up to the publication year of the book

columns.name: foreshadowing_percentage
columns.description: The percentage use of foreshadowing technique in the narrative of the novel.

columns.name: literary_classic_recognition
columns.description: Related to the recognition of a literary classic

columns.name: current_theme_popularity
columns.description: Score reflecting the popularity of the book's main theme based on recent movies and TV shows, normalized on a scale from 1 to 100.

columns.name: metaphor_usage
columns.description: A numeric measure of the frequency and complexity of metaphors used by the author in the novel.

columns.name: tragic_ending
columns.description: Binary indicator if the novel ends on a tragic note, arguably increasing depth and emotional engagement.

columns.name: unexpected_twists
columns.description: Binary indication of whether the novel contains major plot twists.

columns.name: narrative_style_relative_to_genre
columns.description: Numeric score assessing how the author's narrative style compares to prevailing styles within the same genre.

columns.name: critical_review_score
columns.description: Average score of critical reviews on a scale of 1 to 10

columns.name: number_of_central_themes
columns.description: Count of central themes covered in the book

columns.name: author_award_recognition
columns.description: The percentage of awards won by the author out of total nominations received throughout their career.

columns.name: dynamic_characters
columns.description: Numeric count of characters in the novel who experience significant development or changes.

columns.name: influential_period
columns.description: Binary indicator if the book was published during a period considered culturally or historically significant for literature.

columns.name: is_part_of_series
columns.description: Indicates if the book is part of a series (1) or not (0)

columns.name: public_interest_score
columns.description: Aggregate score of public interest based on social media mentions and search engine popularity, normalized on a scale from 1 to 100.

columns.name: author_origin_western
columns.description: A boolean indicating whether the author originates from a Western country.

columns.name: battles
columns.description: Numerical representation of complexity and depth of life challenges addressed in the novel.

columns.name: average_age_of_main_characters
columns.description: Numeric average age of the main characters in the novel.

columns.name: number_of_main_characters
columns.description: Count of main characters in the book

columns.name: era_influence
columns.description: A numerical value representing the impact of the era on the novel's writing style.

columns.name: new_techniques_used
columns.description: Binary indicator of whether new literary techniques typical for the time period are used in the book.

columns.name: lauded_author_factor
columns.description: A derived numeric score indicating the estimated recognition and influence of the author based on their writing style and publication timing.

columns.name: character_complexity_index
columns.description: A numeric index representing the complexity of character development in the novel, rated by literary critics.

columns.name: publication_century
columns.description: The century in which the novel was published, coded numerically (e.g., 18 for the 18th century, 19 for the 19th century, etc.).

columns.name: emotional_depth_percentile
columns.description: A percentile rank showing the depth of emotional engagement in the narrative, as perceived by readers.

columns.name: primary_themes
columns.description: Categorical depiction of the main themes of the novel, e.g., love, betrayal, war, friendship.

columns.name: symbol_richness_score
columns.description: A score reflecting the usage and depth of symbols in the novel.

columns.name: main_character_arc_complexity
columns.description: Boolean indicating if the main character has a complex development arc.

columns.name: literary_award_status
columns.description: Indicates if the book received a major literary award (e.g., Pulitzer, Booker).

columns.name: influential_themes_count
columns.description: Count of major themes associated with different literary movements identified in the book.

columns.name: historical_context_integration
columns.description: A boolean value indicating whether the novel directly incorporates actual historical events or settings.

columns.name: lexical_density
columns.description: Percentage of unique words used among total words, reflecting language complexity

columns.name: total_word_count
columns.description: Total number of words in the book

columns.name: narrative_complexity_score
columns.description: A score assessing the structural and thematic complexity of the narrative in the novel.

columns.name: period_language_style_factor
columns.description: Numeric indicator of language complexity typical for the period the book was written

columns.name: has_movie_adaptation
columns.description: Indicates whether the book has been adapted into a movie

columns.name: literary_award_winner
columns.description: Whether the book has won any major literary awards

columns.name: average_word_count_per_sentence
columns.description: Average number of words per sentence in the book

columns.name: narrative_perspectives_count
columns.description: The count of different narrative perspectives employed within the classical novel.

columns.name: symbolic_elements_index
columns.description: A quantitative measure, on a scale from 1 to 20, reflecting the richness of symbolic elements used in the classical novel.

columns.name: number_of_chapters
columns.description: Total number of chapters in the book

columns.name: number_of_pages
columns.description: Total number of pages in the book

columns.name: author_recognition_factor
columns.description: A composite score calculated from the frequency of author's mentions in literary magazines and academic citations, normalized on a scale from 1 to 50.

columns.name: author_genre_diversity
columns.description: Number of different literary genres in which the author has published works.

queries.question: What is the relationship between the number of literary awards an author has received up to the publication year of a book, the average critical review score of the book, and whether the book has been adapted into a movie when determining the recognition of a book as a literary classic?
queries.true_hypothesis: The recognition of a book as a literary classic is determined by a combined metric of the total number of literary awards received by the author up to the publication year of the book, the average score of critical reviews, and whether the book has been adapted into a movie.
